interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vktech Hair Buns Accessories 2pcs Sponge Swelling Curvature Volume Hair Base
Review Date: 2014/05/16
Store: Vktech
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {}
Review Text: I was excited when I ordered these because I like to make a high poof ponytail from time to time. Unfortunately, these are not going to give me the kind of poof I am looking for because both of them are way too small. They do not compare to Bumpits, which I currently use. The reason I wanted to get these is because I thought it would not show as much as the plastic Bumpits and I thought it would give the same effect. These are not even big enough to give the effect the picture shows. A little disappointed with these! Will have to keep searching for sponges that are big enough. :(
Review Title: Too small, not exactly like the picture shows!
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Preference for Hair Accessories**: The user is focused on products that enhance hairstyle volume and height, particularly enjoying high poofy ponytails.
- **Disappointment with Size and Effectiveness**: They emphasize the critical nature of product size and effectiveness, expressing dissatisfaction when products do not deliver results matching promotional images or expectations. 
- **Comparison to Competitors**: They have experience with other brands and prefer accessories that yield results comparable to those they have successfully used, such as specific products known for creating volume.
- **Value for Aesthetic**: The user is inclined towards accessories that blend discreetly with their hair, seeking options that are less visible than popular items, which aligns with their goal of achieving a natural look.
- **Seeking the Right Fit**: This user remains actively in search of the perfect solutions for hair volume while remaining critical of products that fail to meet their promises. Recent experiences have reinforced their pursuit for adequately sized sponges that will provide the desired height, as their latest attempt did not meet the expectations set by visual representations and previous products. 

Overall, the user continues to prioritize quality, effectiveness, and visual discretion in their search for hair accessory solutions.
